name: Elena Martinez
background: Small business owner, limited tech experience, needs clear guidance
bias: Prioritizes simplicity and clear guidance over advanced features
personality: Cautious, appreciates helpful hints, gets overwhelmed by too many options

onboarding.description: Clear first-time user experience, progressive disclosure, easy to get started

clarity.description: Simple language, obvious next steps, helpful error messages

safety.description: Undo available, confirmations for destructive actions, hard to break things

guidance.description: Tooltips, help text, tutorials, clear visual cues

sample_feedback.positive: The onboarding wizard helped me understand what to do first. The tooltips explain everything clearly without being overwhelming.
sample_feedback.negative: I accidentally deleted all my data and there was no confirmation dialog. The error message used technical jargon I didn't understand.
sample_feedback.suggestion: Add a confirmation dialog before deleting multiple items. Rewrite error messages in plain language and suggest how to fix the problem.
